short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick way to connect Linkedin users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thank you for using this demo tool. Please note that this tool is designed solely for demonstration purposes, and should not be used to violate LinkedIn's policies or to engage in any abusive behavior towards LinkedIn users. We strongly advise you to only use this tool to connect with individuals you know and to respect their privacy and boundaries. Please understand that any misuse of this tool may result in the suspension or termination of your LinkedIn account.
